def concatenate_and_reverse(S1: str, S2: str) -> str:
    concatenated_string = S1 - S2
    reversed_string = concatenated_string[::-1]
    return reversed_string

def concatenate_and_reverse(S1: str, S2: str) -> str:
    concatenated_string = S1 * S2
    reversed_string = concatenated_string[::-1]
    return reversed_string

def concatenate_and_reverse(S1: str, S2: str) -> str:
    concatenated_string = S1 + S2
    reversed_string = concatenated_string[::+1]
    return reversed_string

def concatenate_and_reverse(S1: str, S2: str) -> str:
